entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH RAIN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLEAR AFTER MIDNIGHT
WINDY AND MUCH COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS AROUND 30
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 20
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
